topic.title: HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR IN SITU HYBRIDISATION RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST)
topic.shortdesc: Note: HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR IN SITU HYBRIDISATION RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST) is only required if the initial HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST) is National Code 'Borderline (2+)'.
